author: gshimansky
msg: Fixed tcs to actually clean up upper bytes of eflags

author: acmurthy
msg: HADOOP-2016.  Ignore status-updates from FAILED/KILLED tasks at the TaskTracker. This fixes a race-condition which caused the tasks to wrongly remain in the RUNNING state even after being killed by the JobTracker and thus handicap the cleanup of the task's output sub-directory. Contributed by Arun.
